parameters.name: InputObject
parameters.description: Pointer to the Dispatch object in the assembly context

title: IModelDocExtension.GetCorresponding

parameters.name: InputObject
parameters.description: Pointer to the Dispatch object in the assembly context

returns: Pointer to the corresponding object in the underlying part, assembly, or subassembly document
remarks:
Given an object in an assembly context, this method gets the corresponding object in the underlying component document regardless of whether the document is a part or an assembly.
You can use this method with any object assigned a persistent reference ID; for example, a
IFeature
,
IAnnotation
or
ISketch
object.
